name: Kawaii Fairy Dress Up Game
description:
In Kawaii Fairy Dress Up Game, you are a fairy and you are in a wonderful flowery garden your mission is to protect this little fantastic universe with your magical powers, flying with your delicate wings and protecting the small flora of the place. Choose the best combinations of blouses, skirts, and accessories that match your task of preserving the beauty of the place. 

Have fun! 🥰

Exclusive Game by KawaiiGames.net
